languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}
Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a daemon for the first time in combat, that daemon becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}убеждение{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g}
Всякий раз, когда владелец этого оружия впервые ранит демона в бою, демон получает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепления{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

需要{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}信念{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}
当在战斗中首次{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}恶魔时，会使该恶魔陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}信念{/g} ― {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g}が必要
使用者が戦闘中に初めてディーモンに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}するたび、そのディーモンは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}状態になる。

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}

traits.locale_text:
信念 ― 帝国が必要
戦闘中に初めてディーモンに{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}する度、ターゲットは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}状態になる。

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Convicción{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}
La primera vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacte{/g} a un daemon en combate, este último sufrirá el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}

traits.locale_text:
Requiere Convicción: Imperialis
La primera vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacte{/g} a un daemon en combate, este último sufrirá el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}.

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Überzeugung{/g} – {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g}
Wenn der Träger einen Dämon im Kampf zum ersten Mal {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blendet{/g} ihn dieser Treffer 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}
Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a daemon for the first time in combat, that daemon becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Erfordert Überzeugung — Imperialis
Wann immer der Waffenführer einen Dämon im Kampf zum ersten Mal {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blendet{/g} ihn dieser Treffer für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g}.
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur porte un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} à un démon pour la première fois au combat, ce démon subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Kanaat{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatik{/g} gerektirir
Kullanan kişi, çatışmada bir iblise ilk kez {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} iblis {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşir{/g}. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
